bill_title: provide for the removal of  records of a discharged lien from the deed of real property.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the removal of records of a discharged lien from the deed of real property. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 43-29 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The register of deeds shall remove the record of any lien that has been discharged pursuant to the provisions of chapter 43-29 on the title or deed of any real property upon application by the owner of the property. 170 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.093 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
